tgCommandStartDes: Get the online Aria2 server and open the panel
commandStartRes: %s currently connected, version %s, please select an option
commandHelpRes: ü§ñ A Telegram Bot that controls your Aria2 server.
noActiveTask: There are no tasks in progress!
unknownLink: Unknown download link, please check again
connectSuccess: Aria2 websocket connection established! Aria2 version %s
downloadFolderClear: Delete all files in download folder
doNotHavePermissionControl: You do not have permission to control this Bot
inLocal: The server you are currently controlling is local, and you can control server files
removeDownloadFolderFiles: Delete files from the download folder
nowTMMode: The current Torrent/Magnet download mode is:
setTMMode: The current Torrent/Magnet download mode has been set to:
uploadDownloadFolderFiles: Upload all files in the download folder
moveDownloadFolderFiles: Move files in the download folder
noFilesFound: There are no files in the folder
pleaseSelectTheFileYouWantToDelete: Please select the file you want to delete
pleaseSelectTheFileYouWantToDownload: Please select the file you want to download
pleaseSelectTheFileYouWantToCopy: Please select the file you want to copy
chooseDrive:
Please select the netdisc you want to upload to:
1.OneDrive
2.Google Drive
3.Mega
4.Cloud189
*Due to API limitations, you can only upload the entire download folder at this time. Please delete the files you don't need before clicking upload.*
oneDriveBigFile:
File: `%s` Start upload to OneDrive
Accounts:`%s`
File over 4MB, go to large file channel
oneDriveSmallFile:
File: `%s` Start upload to OneDrive
Accounts:`%s`
File less than 4MB, go to small file channel, uploading in progress
oneDriveGetAccess:
Please open the URL below, log in to your OneDrive account, copy the URL after the jump and send it to this Bot
Note: This program does not involve your private information, please feel free to use it.
oneDriveOAuthFileCreateSuccess: OneDrive OAuth2 file created successfully, save to:
noOneDriveInfo: No OneDrive upload configuration, do you need to create a new one?
accountsAreCurrentlyLogin: The following accounts are currently logged in:
selectAccount: Please select the account to which you want to upload
ariaDisconnect: Monitoring of aria2 disconnection, ready to reconnect
reconnectionFailed: Failed to reconnect for the %d time, wait %d seconds to reconnect
oneDriveUploadTip1:
OneDrive account `%s` 
 Uploading `%s` *[%d/%d]*  Speed:`%s/s` Time: `%d s`
oneDriveUploadTip2:
OneDrive account `%s` 
 Uploading `%s` *[%d/%d]*  Speed:`----` Time: `%d s`
googleDriveGetAccess:
Please open the following URL, log in to your google account and follow the instructions on the page to copy the code and send it to this Bot
Note: This program does not involve your private information, please feel free to use it.
noGoogleDriveInfo: No Google Drive upload configuration, do I need to create a new one?
errorOneDriveAuthURL: The OneDrive OAuth2 link you have entered is incorrect, please re-enter it
googleDriveOAuthFileCreateSuccess: Google Drive OAuth2 file created successfully, save to:
googleDriveUploadTip:
Google Drive account `%s` 
 Uploading `%s` Time: %d s
uploadGoogleDriveComplete: DownloadFolder upload to Google Drive complete
oneDriveUploadFailAndRetry:
OneDrive account `%s` 
 There was a connection problem when uploading `%s`. Retrying. It's the %d times retrying
